preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 1.5 g of copper (Cu) and place in a clean mixing container. 
 2. Measure 1.5 g of magnesium (Mg) and add to the container. 
 3. Measure 9 g of sodium (Na) and add to the mix. 
 4. Finally, measure 40.5 g of selenium (Se) and incorporate it into the mixture. 
 5. Use a mortar and pestle to thoroughly mix all components until homogeneous.
